languages.text: "Взгляните на себя, ютящихся в притоне сем, аки затравленные звери! Напрасно уповаете вы на спасение!"
"Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"
languages.original_text: "Взгляните на себя, ютящихся в притоне сем, аки затравленные звери! Напрасно уповаете вы на спасение!"

traits.locale_text: "Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"
"Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"
"Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"
"Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"
"Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"
"Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"

languages.text: “看看你们的样子吧，你们像野兽一样蜷缩在巢穴里！你们渴望得到救赎，但这不过是徒劳罢了！”
languages.original_text: "Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"

traits.locale_text: “看看你们的样子吧，你们像野兽一样蜷缩在巢穴里！你们渴望得到救赎，但这不过是徒劳罢了！”

languages.text: 「自分たちの姿を見てみろ。巣穴の中に身を寄せ合って、まるで狩られる獣のようだ！救けを求めたって無駄だ！」
languages.original_text: "Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"

traits.locale_text: 「自分たちの姿を見てみろ。巣穴の中に身を寄せ合って、まるで狩られる獣のようだ！救けを求めたって無駄だ！」

languages.text: «¡Mírense, acurrucados en esta guarida como bestias atormentadas! ¡Esperan la salvación en vano!»,
languages.original_text: "Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mírense, acurrucados en esta guarida como bestias atormentadas! ¡Esperan la salvación en vano!»,

languages.text: "Seht Euch doch an, wie Ihr in diesem Loch kauert wie die gejagten Tiere! Vergeblich hofft Ihr auf Erlösung!"
languages.original_text: "Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"

traits.locale_text: "Seht Euch doch an, wie Ihr in diesem Loch kauert wie die gejagten Tiere! Vergeblich hofft Ihr auf Erlösung!"

languages.text: « Regardez-vous, agglutinés dans ce repaire comme des bêtes traquées, à prier pour un salut qui ne viendra jamais ! »
languages.original_text: "Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"

traits.locale_text: « Regardez-vous, agglutinés dans ce repaire comme des bêtes traquées, à prier pour un salut qui ne viendra jamais ! »

languages.text: "Şu hâlinize bakın, avlanan hayvanlar gibi bu ine yığılmışsınız! Kurtulma umutlarınız boşuna!"
languages.original_text: "Look at yourselves, huddled in this den like so many hunted beasts! In vain are you hoping for salvation!"

traits.locale_text: "Şu hâlinize bakın, avlanan hayvanlar gibi bu ine yığılmışsınız! Kurtulma umutlarınız boşuna!"
